alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Barrow and Gwinnett Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1153 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Duluth, or 9 miles west of Lawrenceville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Duluth, Snellville, Suwanee, Lilburn, Norcross, Auburn, Dacula, Grayson, Berkeley Lake, Mountain Park, Harbin and Hog Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
